name: Hud
description: Functions for creating custom screens, drawing on the screen (2D), and rendering in the world (3D). Accessible from scripts via the global `Hud` variable.

methods.name: createScreen

parameters.name: dirtBG
parameters.description: If `true`, the screen will have the classic dirt background.

methods.name: openScreen
getOpenScreen
createTexture
methods.signature: createTexture(width: int, height: int, name: string)

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: The width of the new texture.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: The height of the new texture.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The unique name for the texture.

examples:
// Create a blank 16x16 texture
const blankTexture = Hud.createTexture(16, 16, "my_blank_texture");

methods.name: createTexture

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The absolute path to an image file.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The unique name for the texture.

methods.name: getRegisteredTextures
getScaleFactor
examples:
const scale = Hud.getScaleFactor();
Chat.log(`GUI Scale Factor: ${scale}`);

methods.name: getOpenScreenName
isContainer
createDraw2D
registerDraw2D

parameters.name: overlay
parameters.description: The 2D overlay to register for rendering.

methods.name: unregisterDraw2D
listDraw2Ds
examples:
const overlays = Hud.listDraw2Ds();
Chat.log(`There are ${overlays.size()} active overlays.`);

methods.name: clearDraw2Ds
examples:
Hud.clearDraw2Ds();
Chat.log("All 2D overlays have been cleared.");

methods.name: createDraw3D
registerDraw3D
unregisterDraw3D
listDraw3Ds
examples:
const renders = Hud.listDraw3Ds();
Chat.log(`There are ${renders.size()} active 3D renders.`);

methods.name: clearDraw3Ds
examples:
Hud.clearDraw3Ds();
Chat.log("All 3D renders have been cleared.");

methods.name: getMouseX
examples: const mouseX = Hud.getMouseX();

methods.name: getMouseY
examples: const mouseY = Hud.getMouseY();

methods.name: getWindowWidth
examples: const width = Hud.getWindowWidth();

methods.name: getWindowHeight
examples: const height = Hud.getWindowHeight();
